doc.title: Audition
doc.plot: Following a failed act executed by an antique wind-up monkey, Tuscar, the eyeless mutated cousin of an elephant, reluctantly enters the spotlight to try out for a part in a major motion picture. Under the scrutiny of ceramic clowns, old toys and leather puppets, Tuscar's quiet determination and unlikely success is revealed as he nervously performs a painful three-act audition. By pushing away the remnants of his failures and continuing to perform, Tuscar takes control over his nightmare and finds that artistic failure can ultimately lead to success.
